website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you don't have a lot of tools to carry, and your budget is a top priority; otherwise competitors we considered have more to offer.
pros: An affordable compact bag that earns praise for fitting a surprising amount of tools considering the 13-inch size
Made by Craftsman – a trusted tool manufacturer
cons: Though it has several exterior pockets, it only has one large interior pocket
Mesh pockets are handy, but not suitable for large, heavy tools
Zipper pull tab and zipper breakage have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space but not so big it takes up a lot of space...if that makes sense
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I wanted it for. A lot of space inside but the bag itself is small and doesn't take up much room on my shelf. I have my drill and charger, bits, hammer, screw driver, pliers, and a few other miscellaneous things thrown in there. There is still plenty of room to spare for more stuff. My utility knife fit well in one of the outside pockets-not so far in there that I would struggle to get it out but not hanging out to the point that I think it would fall out. I don't have that many tools-just enough for things I can handle around the house myself so this is great.
customer_reviews.author: BAESC87

customer_reviews.title: Woman tested !!
customer_reviews.text: VERY sturdy. Great product ! I use this for tool storage in my vehicle, just in case. As a woman, I HATE not having tools if/when I need them l, and toting my big tool box around, is out of the question. Part of the zipper handle broke, but it's no biggie, the bag itself is what matters. I recommend this to anybody, man or woman....either keep it in your car/truck/suv, or use it for taking tools to wherever you're working on whatever project....the marina, or the garage. Woman tested and approved !! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Eros

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot
customer_reviews.text: This bag is nice and has a metal frame that keeps it in shape and is tough. Very tough fabric. And surprisingly big. This fits my drill, battery, charger, drill index, a case of screwdriver bits, socket bits, and a second small drill index. And there's still room to spare. Almost wish it had a pocket or 2 inside though to help keep things organized. Craftsman doesn't sell a hard drill case anymore though so I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Fields

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a good Craftsman tool bag in my opinion. Seems to be made well, material seems sturdy, although I did cut some threads that were long on the stitching. Has 6 handy front pockets, 3 fabric, 3 mesh. Has plenty of room for my Milwaukee impact gun, 2 batteries, battery charger & a 54 piece case of impact screwdriver bits.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: These tool bags are awesome. You can just keep putting things in it ...
customer_reviews.text: These tool bags are awesome. You can just keep putting things in it and the bag swallows it and it seems as if you didn't even add to the bag. I use one for my trunk with emergency items and the other for my camping gear. They are so economical and they are sturdy. You can't go wrong with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly fits A LOT of stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put together a road side tool bag for a long road trip. This bag is durable and holds quite a bit of tools. It is the quality that I would expect from a craftsman product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for fiance` , he loaded it with his most used tools. Heavy duty, good quality. Handy to pick up and go with. Good size, wide opening, for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 20 volt craftsman drill, battery, charger and drill bit kits. Wide opening makes it easy to access tools. Looks like it will be durable enough to last a long time. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Wise

customer_reviews.title: Very handy.
customer_reviews.text: I like these and I have a few of them for various sets of tools, bike tools, detail/fine work tools, electrical tools, etc. I like that they do not have many pockets inside or outside. That seems to work better for me. They do seem a little pricy since the ones with all the loops and pockets cost about the same. Even though they are less desirable to me, they do require more material and labor to construct. That's the only thing keeping it from being a 5 star item. They are constructed very well with huge strong zippers, etc. Will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool bag
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my first home and needed a place to store my tools. Nice sturdy bag I keep under my sink. The bag is a decent size and can hold quite a bit
customer_reviews.author: teesee

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Needed 1 for work since they havnt given any for team members lately. Price was fantastic. Huge open zippered part. Sturdy. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Great tool bag.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I can transport some tools from my locker to my work area. Looks as if it's made of quality material, as I would imagine since it has the craftsman logo on it. Overall great product for its value.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Air Compressor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold my Viair 00088 Air Compressor. I works perfectly and was pretty inexpensive. Also pretty roomy for other items. Will possibly buy another for more car emergency items - flashlight, batteries, etc
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tool bag
customer_reviews.text: I feel this is made well, sturdy, and I am glad I bought it. I can't have enough tool bags as I use them to sort tools by function and so I have about 20!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Burton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing roadside emergency supplies
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Perfect for storing my Halo Bolt car charge, all the attachments, flashlight and other emergency roadside items. Love the red of the bag because the color makes it easy to spot even in an all dark interior trunk in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: smiles and sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman tool bag like but don't love like the original.
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as the original bag. The original bags had pockets on both sides and pockets on the inside to sort all my carry stuff and the zipper seems a bit cheap. It's still strong material like the original but definitely a copy cat. I just like the bag but don't love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fits my new Craftsman drill to a T! And I also ordered all the bits with it, and it fits in the bag too. Can't beat that with a stick!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. White

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.  Love the flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. They hold so much more than plastic tool boxes in the same size as they are flexible. Which for me is awesome as these are flexible and I can fit more of these in the area I store the bags and I can get more tools in there too!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Right size for my drill
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a carry bag for my Craftsman drill, batteries and charger, and this bag is the perfect size. It has 6 side pockets, sturdy material and a heavy duty zipper. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman Drill with accessories!  Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you purchase the bag like I did everything fits perfectly and it’s the best way to carry your drill with you.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Morales

customer_reviews.title: So far so good - I haven't really used the outside/exterior pockets in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag to carry misc tools (obviously). So far so good - I haven't really used the outside/exterior pockets in fear of stuff falling out for my uses, I just need the big middle zipper area for my needs and it works perfect for that. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, worth the $ and holds a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband's birthday and he LOVES it! The bag is made of sturdy material and holds lots of his tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Good Size
customer_reviews.text: My household tools where scattered in a box and I got tired of digging when I needed one. This is a great storage bag for them and it's big enough to hold them all, including my power drill. And if I need to take tools somewhere, everything is in one place. Seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ann Jaffarian

customer_reviews.title: Good toolbox for household use
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect to hold the household tools needed for everyday uses and even long enough to hold a hammer. It's soft and lightweight so I can carry it to the job and not have to keep going back to the junk drawer to get what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space, easy to lug around.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. It has a lot of room to hold my small to medium tools without being too bulky. Easy to carry around in the materials are well-made. I could see myself having this for many years down the road and still be reliable.
customer_reviews.author: RSC

customer_reviews.title: so far I love it. Zipper seems pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Just put all my main "more used" tools in it, so far I love it. Zipper seems pretty good. Will update if any issues. 4 stars because it's not super high quality, but does feel pretty darn good.
customer_reviews.author: Shrillin.TV

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our son in law, because my husband has had one just like it for years. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: susan collins

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to use as storage bag for Viair 88P air pump
customer_reviews.text: Large zippered opening allow this to be used for storing Viair 88P portable air pump in car
customer_reviews.author: Southern States Auto Repair

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag for a drill and accessories. This one is sturdy and the right size for the job. It was inexpensive. I can live with the logo. I think it's fun that the drill in the bag is not a Craftsman.
customer_reviews.author: Joel FritzTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed, I thought it would have pockets inside to store different tools.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good bags very flimsy compared to my husky but ok for tools that don't break easily i put my power tools in the husky

customer_reviews.text: This is bigger than expected, and can hold EVERYTHING our camping tool kit needs, and then some. Axe, mallet, spike puller, 20 extra spikes, tent broom, etc.... And it's still not half full!

customer_reviews.title: It does what it suppose to do

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Love it . We have a bigger one to works great for both cars.

customer_reviews.title: The right size for a small apartment
customer_reviews.text: I have some basic home tools (hammer, level, various screwdrivers, utility knife) for use around my apartment, and this tool bag is the perfect size. It's pretty sturdy, and I like using the outside pockets for holding mini-screwdrivers so they don't get lost inside with the bigger tools.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible quality zipper
customer_reviews.text: First the zipper pull broke and then finally (after a year of very light use) the zipper itself broke. Absolutely terrible quality zipper. Bag itself isn’t that bad but now I can’t keep it closed.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My jig saw and blades fit perfect!! I ordered extras!!

customer_reviews.text: Did not hold up to random tools riding in the back of the Jeep.

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrying bags for tools and small equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these bags quite a bit. Never had an issue with them.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son. He absolutely loved it. Great tool bag. Perfect size. Large enough for the drill I got him also.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great "go kit"
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these to prepare some "network go kits" for team members in my company who will be deploying a computer network at a new facility we bought. This case isn't huge, easily tote-able, and has several pouches inside. It was just right for a handful of tools and supplies. No quality issues and completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: THATCHMAN1

customer_reviews.title: Best tool tote
customer_reviews.text: Wow the picture doesn't do this bag justice. Very large and I have never seen a sturdier zipper. It has mesh pockets, 3 on the outside and none on the inside. Well designed mouth that stays open. I bought this for my drills and chargers. Excellent quality. Very happy with this bag. I love Craftsman products you pay for quality and this fits the bill
customer_reviews.author: kittylover

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these Craftsman bags. They are well made and perfect for Harry and Harriett Homeowner. Purchased a few at a better price at Sears store last year but with Covid-19 worth a little extra to have it delivered to door.
customer_reviews.author: wct

customer_reviews.title: It’s wonderful and can hold lots of tools so I don’t ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s wonderful and can hold lots of tools so I don’t lose them around the house, plenty large enough for most needed tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman
customer_reviews.text: It's a craftsman tool bag that I purchased for my vehicle. Its sturdy and holds up well. Very spacious and has separate compartments on the outside. The inside is just a huge open compartment. If you're familiar with Craftsman and there quality then you should agree that it will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: tlight

customer_reviews.title: great bag
customer_reviews.text: great bag, just as described. fits my c3 drill with battery separated from it, along with a charger and drill bit set. made a nice kit.

customer_reviews.title: Great for tools for motorcycles, great capacity, easy to find tools
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my BMW K1200GT. I loaded one with a hot shot jumper for long distance over the road trips, and the other one with basic metric tools. Easy to open, and the wide mouth makes it easy to find the right tool quickly. Both fit easily in my top case on the back of the bike.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Its a good size bag for my tools for work. I dont have alot of tools so this is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made tool bag. Perfect for carrying tools/items down to the dock to work on boat etc. I have 4 qts of oil, oil filter wrenches, volt tester work towels etc in it right now to use in the morning. I also have a 19" bag which is to big unless i'm doing work with pvc and sprinklers for the lawn or something like that..

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: 3rd same bag that husband own. Loves it!!! Ordered 2 for him to have a spare.

customer_reviews.title: but a great deal and handy bag
customer_reviews.text: The zipper takes a little breaking in, but a great deal and handy bag.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and sturdy, as are all Craftsman products. Despite accurate measurement being given, it was a little larger than I'd wanted, but I kept it and am sure It'll definitely hold everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: JCRT

customer_reviews.title: Great tool bag!
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these bags. One of which I've had for years. Durable and very handy for common tools or ratchet straps.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as tool bag between two cars and it fits like a glove. Good construction, fast shipping, just the right size for the tools I want to take.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Used for a first aid kit! Works great! Good quality, sturdy!

customer_reviews.title: Great lil bag
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag, taller than expected. Would prefer it to be a lower profile because the bigger the bag the more tools you carry.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what he needed
customer_reviews.text: My husband was, sadly, using our 5yo's tool bag so I had to get him his own. He likes that he can open it fully and the opening has a frame so he can easily access the things at the bottom without the bag falling shut. I actually bought him a second one for his tools and medications he uses on our sheep.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxonia

customer_reviews.title: A lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Not as well made as the Craftsman tool bags of yesteryear, but what is nowadays? I'm using it as a storage bag for an air pump. I suppose it will do nicely for this but I don't think it would for a demanding use like real (and heavy) tools.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in AL

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect bag for keeping many tools safely
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect bag for keeping many tools safely. I use it to store my electrical drill along with drill bits and screws, and other important tools. It's very sturdy and it is big enough to fit about 3 small electric drills.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Nice, tough handy bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This craftsman tool bag is great for carrying all of your tool and other stuff as I do to computer maintenance jobs. It is nice looking, sturdy and has enough room for most tools, including the front pockets for carrying extras. I would recommend this tool bag at this affordable price! PWN
